tool_description: This API contains all district capitals in Ghana.
title: District Capitals In Ghana

api_list.name: Get District Capital By Name
api_list.description: This endpoint gets a district capital by district name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://district-capitals-in-ghana.p.rapidapi.com/district_capitals/name/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "district-capitals-in-ghana.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get District Capital By ID
api_list.description: This endpoint gets a particular district capital by ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://district-capitals-in-ghana.p.rapidapi.com/district_capitals/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "district-capitals-in-ghana.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All District Capital
api_list.description: The endpoint retrieves all the district capitals
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://district-capitals-in-ghana.p.rapidapi.com/district_capitals/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "district-capitals-in-ghana.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
